Home.description: About Govtech As laid down in the Digital Government Policy 2022 â€“ 2035, Cambodia is aiming to implement a smart government based on the use of digital infrastructure and technology by 2035. This means, that even today Cambodian ministries and administrations need to enhance the adoption of digital technologies to improve public services, enhance transparency and engage citizens and businesses.
Home.conferenceDate: The Conference takes place on November 19, 2024.
Home.govTechExpected: The second edition of the GovTech conference aims to once again bring together all Cambodian ministries and relevant administrations as well as selected development partners and private sector actors to showcase achieved progress, discuss challenges and jointly work on solutions for them. The conference aims to educate technical and leadership from the public sector on technical priorities, existing solutions and available support for the digital transformation journey of their respective institution.
